author: alchemyfinance
content:
how do i do by
```Run your chosen execution engine, e.g: docker-compose --env-file <testnet-name>.vars -f docker-compose.geth.yml up -d
```
in cli

author: parithosh
content: that question would be appropriate for the merge > testing channel. But the command to run is shown in the `e.g`. You need to use `docker-compose --env-file kintsugi.vars -f docker-compose.geth.yml up -d` to run geth.
